      • createWarrior

        public void createWarrior(int start)
        Parameters:
        start - inteiro de 0 a 10 se for outro valor, start = 3 
         Criar um Warrior
        
 Devolve Player warrior configurado com:
        
 Health = 15  + rnd(start + 5)
        
 Strength = 15 + rnd(health)
        
 Intelligence = 5 + rnd(strength)
        
 Evade = start + rnd(start)

      • createThief

        public void createThief(int start)
        Parameters:
        start - inteiro de 0 a 5 se for outro valor, start = 1 
         Criar um Thief
        
 Devolve Player Thief configurado com:
        
 Health = start  + rnd(start + 5)
        
 Strength = 5 + start + rnd(5)
        
 Intelligence = 5 
        
 Evade = start + rnd(100)
